A

add(Sprite) - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
Adds a sprite to the end of the group.
addAll(List<Sprite>) - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
Adds all the passed in elements to the group.
angleTo(Position) - Method in class gametools.Position
Uses trigonometry to calculate the angle to the specified position.
Animation - Class in gametools
Used to animate game objects such as sprites.
Animation(BufferedImage) - Constructor for class gametools.Animation
Creates an animation with just one still image.
Animation(BufferedImage[]) - Constructor for class gametools.Animation
Creates an animation using each element of the passed in array for a frame.
Animation(BufferedImage[], int) - Constructor for class gametools.Animation
Creates an animation using each element of the passed in array for a frame and sets the animation speed.
Animation(Animation) - Constructor for class gametools.Animation
Creates an animation and copies over the properties from the passed in object.
Animation(BufferedImage[], int, int) - Constructor for class gametools.Animation
Creates an animation using each element of the passed in array for a frame and sets the animation speed and repeat amount.
ar(Position, Position) - Static method in class gametools.Tools
Converts two points to an area object going through those positions.
ar(Position, Dimension) - Static method in class gametools.Tools
The short form notation for creating an area.
Area - Class in gametools
Used for basic positioning and collision.
Area() - Constructor for class gametools.Area
Creates an area with the coordinates and dimensions of zero.
Area(Position) - Constructor for class gametools.Area
Creates an area on the specified position with dimensions of zero.
Area(Dimension) - Constructor for class gametools.Area
Creates an area with custom dimensions and coordinates of zero.
Area(Area) - Constructor for class gametools.Area
Creates an area and copies over the properties from the passed in object.
Area(Position, Dimension) - Constructor for class gametools.Area
Creates an area at the x and y with the specified dimensions.
